content:
Hi All,

Last week the CISL Consulting Group, in conjunction with ESDS, kicked off the Analysis Workflow Special Interest Group (AWSIG). The slides from that event are available here.

The next ASWIG meeting will take place Monday , Sept. 19 during the normal ESDS Forum time slot (2pm - 3pm).

Lastly, if you want to suggest or upvote a future discussion topic, check out the spreadsheet here.
